statements: SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature'
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM SensorData ORDER BY sensor_id DESC
SELECT AVG(temperature) as avg_temp FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING avg_temp > 20
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 25 AND 30 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_type FROM SensorData
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, temperature, humidity, timestamp FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, temperature FROM SensorData WHERE humidity >= 50 AND temperature <= 30;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, humidity FROM SensorData ORDER BY sensor_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, timestamp FROM SensorData WHERE humidity > 60 AND temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 25 ORDER BY humidity DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM temperature_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM temperature_data
SELECT sensor_id, humidity, timestamp FROM humidity_data ORDER BY humidity ASC
SELECT AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM humidity_data
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, timestamp FROM temperature_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, humidity, timestamp FROM humidity_data WHERE humidity > 50 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-01' ORDER BY humidity ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT * FROM temperature_data INNER JOIN humidity_data ON temperature_data.sensor_id = humidity_data.sensor_id WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC LIMIT 20
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM temperature_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(temperature) > 20 ORDER BY avg_temp DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(humidity) AS max_humidity, MIN(humidity) AS min_humidity FROM humidity_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING MAX(humidity) - MIN(humidity) > 10 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM temperature_sensor_data
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, temperature FROM humidity_sensor_data
SELECT location, type FROM sensor_metadata
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, timestamp FROM temperature_sensor_data
SELECT * FROM sensor_metadata ORDER BY sensor_id DESC
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, temperature FROM temperature_sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, humidity FROM humidity_sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC

SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM temperature_sensor_data JOIN humidity_sensor_data ON temperature_sensor_data.sensor_id = humidity_sensor_data.sensor_id AND temperature_sensor_data.timestamp = humidity_sensor_data.timestamp
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM temperature_sensor_data JOIN humidity_sensor_data USING(sensor_id, timestamp) WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60
SELECT sensor_id, location, type FROM sensor_metadata WHERE type = 'Temperature' OR type = 'Humidity'
SELECT * FROM temperature_sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, temperature FROM temperature_sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT id, humidity FROM humidity_sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Room A' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT sensors.name, sensor_types.type FROM sensors JOIN sensor_types ON sensors.id = sensor_types.id;
SELECT * FROM temperature_sensor_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM temperature_sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensors.name, sensors.location, temperature_sensor_data.temperature FROM sensors INNER JOIN temperature_sensor_data ON sensors.id = temperature_sensor_data.sensor_id;
SELECT id, type FROM sensor_types WHERE type = 'temperature' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature, MIN(temperature) AS min_temperature FROM temperature_sensor_data;
SELECT * FROM temperature_sensors;
SELECT location, temperature, timestamp FROM temperature_sensors ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location, temperature FROM temperature_sensors WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM humidity_sensors WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT sensor_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM sensor_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM temperature_sensors ORDER BY temperature DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, location, humidity FROM humidity_sensors WHERE humidity > 70 ORDER BY humidity DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, data_type, data_value FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-09-01' AND timestamp < '2022-09-10' ORDER BY data_value ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM sensor_logs WHERE sensor_id = 3 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sensor_alerts WHERE acknowledged = FALSE ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
